word: (Ch. 1:8; Matthew 6:24.) Essential Work for the Sinner Defined.--The Lord says, "Draw nigh to God." How? By secret, earnest examination of your own heart, by childlike, heartfelt, humble dependence upon God, making known all your weakness to Jesus, and by confessing your sins. Thus you may draw nigh to God, and He will draw nigh to you.
